title: The Wild Swans
subtle:
Fairy Tale (fiction), 716 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 640L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and L
description: The Wild Swans is a fairy tale that tells about a princess named Eliza and her eleven brothers. When their evil stepmother turns her brothers into swans, it is up to Eliza to turn them back again, but can she do it in time? Detailed and colorful illustrations will add to students' interest in this story. The book can also be used to teach students how to make inferences and draw conclusions as well as to retell to better understand the story. The book and lesson are also available for levels I and L.
highFrequencyWords: ceased, commence, in vain, knit, nettle, perseverance, task, utter, wicked
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Consonant Digraphs : Identify initial consonant sh digraph
awareness: Proper Nouns                : Recognize and use proper nouns that name people
phonics: Synonyms and Antonyms                : Identify and use synonyms and antonyms
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
